company.name: LAX 360
company.description: LAX 360 is a full-service product design and development company offering Graphic Design & Branding, App Development, Software Development, CAD Design & Product Modeling.
company.mission: Provide innovative, functional, aesthetic, future-ready solutions.
company.vision: To be a global leader in creative technology.

services.title: CAD Design & Product Modeling
services.description: Precision modeling and prototyping for manufacturing.

services.title: MEP Designing
services.description: Comprehensive Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing design solutions.

services.title: Raspberry Pi & Arduino Projects
services.description: Innovative IoT and embedded system solutions.

services.title: Graphic Design & Branding
services.description: We craft visual identities that resonate with your audience.

services.title: Software & Digital Solutions
services.description: End-to-end digital solutions for web, mobile, and marketing.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: Data-driven marketing strategies that grow visibility, traffic, and conversions.

process.title: Research & Strategy
process.description: We analyze your needs and market trends to build a solid foundation.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our creative and technical teams bring ideas to life.

process.title: Testing & Refinement
process.description: Rigorous testing ensures quality and performance.

process.title: Launch & Support
process.description: We help you launch and provide ongoing support.
